In the junit3x.zip you find a src.jar archive which contains all the
sources.
The reflection code is within the junit.framework.TestSuite class.

Johannes

> Does anyone know where I could find the source code for TestRunner, I can
> only find the class files.  I am trying to work out how to use reflection
to
> extract the methods from the class, before passing them to the run method.
> I guess this is already built into the framework.
>
> Peter Cullinan.
subject: Re: [junit] source code for TestRunner
